summary.para: Registers one or more Media Foundation transforms (MFTs) in the caller's process.

param.name: pMFTs
param.para: A pointer to an array of structures.

param.name: cMFTs
param.para: The number of elements in the pMFTs array.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is similar to the function. It registers one or more MFTs in the caller's process. These MFTs can be enumerated by calling the function with the MFT_ENUM_FLAG_LOCALMFT flag.

Unlike , however, this method also makes the MFT available in the Protected Media Path (PMP) process, and is therefore useful if you are using the Media Session inside the PMP. For more information, see the following topics:

summary.para: Registers Media Foundation transforms (MFTs) in the caller's process.
The Media Session exposes this interface as a service. To obtain a pointer to this interface, call the method on the Media Session with the service identifier MF_LOCAL_MFT_REGISTRATION_SERVICE.
